item.title: How do I..?
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

public void timedMessage(int seconds) {
	time = seconds x 1000;
	currentTime = System.getCurrentMiliseconds();
	if (currentTime >= timeToMessage) {
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "message";
	}
}

Add that above public boolean process(), and under public boolean process(), add:

timedMessage(time);

Replace time with the time (in seconds) that you want to go by before the message is delivered. Keep in mind, it resets every time you reset the server.
